attributes.action: More Saftey for cyclists on the road
attributes.additional_details: I want the government to come up with better safety precautions for the cyclists on the road, there is no point in trying to fill the already congested road with cyclists with all these cycling incentives if their safety is not considered.

rejection.details: It would help people in deciding whether or not to support this petition if it set out what sort of approach is being advocated - is it changes to infrastructure (such as building cycle lanes) or changes to people's behaviour (such as requiring the wearing of high-visibility clothing)?
